name: Float like a Butterfly
text:
Swap this card with a different gold card in your deck.
_(This card starts the game in your hand.)_

name: Sting like a Bee
text:
Target a unit at maximum range.
After the attack: Swap this card with a different gold card in your deck.
_(This card starts the game in your deck.)_

name: Strike like a Tiger
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Swap this card with a different gold card in your deck.
_(This card starts the game in your deck.)_

name: Bushido
text: Swap your gold card with a different gold card in your deck; if you swap a resolved or discarded card this way, place the new card facedown.

name: Shameful Display
text: _(You are defeated.)_

name: Set an Example
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: A friendly hero in radius may swap their unresolved card with a card in their hand.

name: Proven Warrior
text: Choose a card in the discard of a friendly hero in radius. An enemy hero in radius discards a card of the same color, if able.

name: Come to Aid
text:
A friendly hero in range may discard a card.
If that hero has a card in the discard, you may move up to 3 spaces.

name: Lead from the Front
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: A friendly hero in radius may swap their unresolved card with a card in their hand.

name: Spinning Blade
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This turn:** Empty spaces adjacent to you count as obstacles for enemy units.

name: Hold my Sake
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: A friendly hero in radius may swap their unresolved card with a card in their hand, or in their discard.

name: Blade Helix
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This turn:** Empty spaces in radius to you count as obstacles for enemy units.

name: Chosen Champion
text: Choose a card in the discard of a friendly hero in radius. An enemy hero in radius discards a card of the same color, if able.

name: Calculated Risk
text: A friendly hero in radius may discard an attack card. If that hero has a card in the discard, that hero may move up to 2 spaces.

name: The Right Hand
text: Choose a card in the discard of a friendly hero in radius. Up to two enemy heroes in radius discard a card of the same color, if able.

name: Tactical Gambit
text: A friendly hero in radius may discard an attack card. If that hero has a card in the discard, that hero may move up to 2 spaces, ignoring obstacles.

name: Bring the Relief
text:
A friendly hero in range may discard a card.
If that hero has a card in the discard, you may move up to 4 spaces.

name: Pledge of Allegiance
text:
A friendly hero in radius may discard a card.
If that hero has a card in the discard, both you and that hero gain 1 coin and you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Commit Reserves
text:
A friendly hero in range may discard a card.
If that hero has a card in the discard, you may move up to 4 spaces, ignoring obstacles.

name: Loyal Retainer
text:
A friendly hero in radius may discard a card.
If that hero has a card in the discard, both you and that hero gain 2 coins and you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Ready for War
text:
Return your silver card to your deck and take two gold cards from your deck into your hand.
_(You now have a total hand size of 6 cards.)_
